channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Tesla Model Y Long Range Rear-Wheel Drive Version Adds... Range
item.description: Tesla's Model Y was the biggest selling car of 2023, but has barely been updated since launch. Now there's a new Long Range Rear-Wheel Drive version. ...

item.description: WWE spun together an excellent episode of Smackdown on Friday. The standout portion included the Bloodline as the return of a legendary member was tea...

item.title: Decisions as effort
item.description: Why are we more likely to get tasks done than to take on new initiatives? Checking something off a to-do list requires far less emotional energy than ...

item.title: Microsoft Windows Deadline—10 Days To Update Or Stop Using Your PC
item.description: Government issues emergency update warning for all Windows users, with existing security fixes likely “insufficient.”

item.title: Moving toward ease
item.description: “Ease” isn’t the same as “easy.” In fact, they’re often at odds. Easy work is hardly worth our effort. It can deaden us instead of giving us the chanc...

item.title: Gadhouse Mathis Vinyl Turntable Brings New Tech To A Classic Format
item.description: Vinyl records are growing in popularity and that's why we are seeing new turntables being launched like the Gadhouse Mathis, a 1980s-inspired turntabl...

item.title: Western Digital Introduces 32TB SMR Data Center HDD Using 11 Disks
item.description: WDC announced that it is shipping SMR data center drives with up to 32TB capacity on 11 disks and non-SMR drives with up to 26TB capacity on 11 disks.

item.title: Confused about good
item.description: How often do we assume that popular things are good, and that good things become popular? If your work doesn’t catch on, does that mean it wasn’t good...

item.title: The interaction cascade
